sorular.soru: Do you have to turn left here?
cevaplar: Yes. All vehicles must travel in this direction.
No. This only applies to vehicles transporting hazardous materials.

feedback.metin: This sign indicates a diversion route along with the route number. You are not required to take the diversion route.

sorular.soru: Should you indicate when changing lanes?
cevaplar: Yes, that is required in some cases.

feedback.metin: Changing lanes is a special manoeuvre whereby you must give way to other traffic and indicate your intended direction of travel immediately before changing lanes.

sorular.soru: What should you do if this light on your dashboard comes on while driving?
cevaplar: Schedule a maintenance appointment at a garage.
Stop immediately in a safe place.
Drive to a garage as soon as possible.
sorular.dogruCevap: Stop immediately in a safe place.

feedback.metin: This light warns of low brake fluid, worn brake pads, an ABS problem, or an activated parking brake. Stop immediately in a safe location. First, check the parking brake and brake fluid. If this does not resolve the problem, contact the breakdown service.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to drop off a passenger here?

feedback.metin: You are in a zone where parking is prohibited. You are allowed to stop here to drop off a passenger, as this does not constitute parking.

sorular.soru: What danger lies in this overtaking manoeuvre?
cevaplar: Your view for overtaking is insufficient.
The cyclist can suddenly turn left.
Drivers from the right may not see you in time.
sorular.dogruCevap: The cyclist can suddenly turn left.

feedback.metin: Overtaking at an intersection is only prohibited when doing so results in a dangerous situation. Overtaking at intersections where the flow of traffic is unclear is therefore prohibited. This is a reasonably well-organised intersection, and you do not have to give right of way to anyone because you are driving on a priority road. However, you must take into account the possibility of cyclists turning off without checking over their shoulder. In this situation, it is therefore wise to stay behind the cyclist until you have passed the intersection.

sorular.soru: Are you pre-sorted correctly here?

feedback.metin: You may use a bicycle lane with a broken line to get into the right lane, provided you do not obstruct other vehicles such as cyclists or snorfietsers. If you were to get into the cycle lane here, you are obstructing the cyclist. This is because you have to wait for the pedestrian and thus stop.

sorular.soru: Which documents should a disabled driver place visibly in the car?
cevaplar: A disabled parking card and a parking disc.
sorular.dogruCevap: A disabled parking card and a parking disc.

feedback.metin: You must also use a parking disc in a disabled car park where a maximum parking time is indicated. This prevents the same car being parked in a disabled parking space for too long. Disabled parking spaces with a maximum parking time and mandatory use of a parking disc are not required to have a blue stripe.

sorular.soru: Can you keep driving here if you want to go straight on?
cevaplar: No. You must use the right lane to continue straight on.
No. You are only allowed to drive on the left if this improves the flow of traffic.
Yes. You can use both lanes to continue straight on.
sorular.dogruCevap: Yes. You can use both lanes to continue straight on.

feedback.metin: Keeping to the right is not mandatory when approaching or driving around roundabouts. This means you can use whichever lane you want, regardless of how busy the road is.

sorular.soru: Are you driving in a built-up area?

feedback.metin: The B-1 priority sign indicates that you are inside a built-up area. The sign is placed inside built-up areas in front of an intersection and outside built-up areas after an intersection.

sorular.soru: What should you do in this situation?

feedback.metin: If there are children playing on the footpath or pavement, you do not have to stop immediately, but you do have to drive in an adapted way. This means that you reduce the speed and take into account the fact that children are playful and often do not pay attention. Sometimes they can suddenly run into the street. Honking is only allowed if there is a danger. As long as the children do not run on the road, this is not yet the case.

sorular.soru: How do you handle this situation?
cevaplar: You both determine who has right of way.
The fastest vehicle has right of way.
The police vehicle always has right of way.
sorular.dogruCevap: You both determine who has right of way.

feedback.metin: As there is an obstacle on both sides, there is no rule on who has right of way. You must determine together who goes first. Usually this is the vehicle that arrives first, but if you arrive at the same time you arrange to give way by eye contact and possibly hand gestures. Because the police car is not using optical and sound signals, this is not an emergency vehicle but in this case it is equivalent to you.

sorular.soru: What is the best thing to do on a steep slope?

feedback.metin: If you want to drive up a steep slope, it is wise to shift down to a lower gear. A higher RPM makes better use of the engineâ€™s pulling power, which makes it easier to drive up the slope.

sorular.soru: Should you give way to the other passenger car?
cevaplar: Yes. You must give way to all other traffic.
No. He is exiting a road with an exit construction.
Yes. This will promote the flow of traffic.
sorular.dogruCevap: Yes. This will promote the flow of traffic.

feedback.metin: The other vehicle is exiting a side road with an entrance/exit construction. When leaving or entering an entrance/exit construction, you must give way to all other traffic. While both vehicles must give way to all traffic, because an entrance/exit is often narrower than the main road, it is wise to allow the vehicle leaving the exit to go first.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to drive here?

feedback.metin: You are driving on the incorrect side of the median. If the road is divided into two lanes by a wide median, you should use the right lane. Usually, this is indicated by traffic signs, but even if this is not the case, you should use the right lane.

sorular.soru: How much tread does a winter tyre need in order to function optimally?

feedback.metin: A minimum tread depth of 4 millimetres is recommended to make the best use of winter tyres. For summer tyres this is 2 millimetres. The legal minimum for all tyres is 1.6 millimetres, with no distinction being made between summer and winter tyres.

sorular.soru: What speed limit should you expect here?

feedback.metin: The green axle line indicates that this is an autoweg. On autowegen, the speed limit is 100 km/h, unless signage indicates a lower speed limit.

sorular.soru: Should you give way to the pedestrians?

feedback.metin: Drivers are not allowed to proceed when there is oncoming traffic. Pedestrians are also categorised as traffic. You must give way to any oncoming traffic, i.e. the black arrow goes before the red arrow.

sorular.soru: Should you give way to pedestrians when entering a roundabout?
cevaplar: Yes. Just as when leaving the roundabout, this is mandatory.
Only if there is a pedestrian crossing.
No. Pedestrians never have right of way on a roundabout.
sorular.dogruCevap: Only if there is a pedestrian crossing.

feedback.metin: When entering a roundabout, the pedestrian following the roundabout is crossing traffic. The signs at the roundabout indicate that you should give way to drivers on the intersecting road. However, pedestrians are not drivers and therefore have no right of way. Therefore, when entering a roundabout, pedestrians are only allowed to go first when crossing at a pedestrian crossing.

sorular.soru: What is the alcohol limit for a 2toDrive driver?

feedback.metin: A maximum limit of 0.2 per mille applies to a new driver. A 2toDrive driver is always a new driver.

sorular.soru: What do you do first if you have a breakdown on the left lane of the motorway and you can no longer reach the hard shoulder while driving?
cevaplar: Turn on your hazard lights and push the car to the hard shoulder.
Turn on your hazard lights, get out, and stand in the median.
Turn on your hazard lights, get out, and cross to the hard shoulder.
sorular.dogruCevap: Turn on your hazard lights, get out, and stand in the median.

feedback.metin: If you have a breakdown on the left lane and you are no longer able to drive to the hard shoulder, turn on your hazard lights and position your car as close to the crash barrier as possible or in the median. Get out and stand in the median. Then call 112 immediately. Never cross lanes and never push your car to the hard shoulder.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to enter this road while towing the red vehicle?

feedback.metin: A towed vehicle falls under the category of trailers. The sign shows that this road is closed for motor vehicles with trailers. You are not allowed to drive here.

sorular.soru: What is the maximum length of a lorry with this marking sign?

feedback.metin: This marker indicates that you are dealing with an LZV, a longer and heavier lorry combination. The maximum length of this type of vehicle combination is 25.25 metres. As a car driver, you have to take this into account when overtaking, for example, or when the vehicle wants to turn off. In the latter case, this combination needs even more space than an average lorry.

sorular.soru: You want to move one lane to the right in this traffic jam. Should you take the motorcyclist into account?

feedback.metin: If there is congestion, motorcyclists are allowed to ride in between the lanes. They are only allowed to do this between the two leftmost lanes. If you want to move one lane to the right, you should take this into account. You are then performing a special manoeuvre and must give way to all other traffic, including the motorcyclist.

sorular.soru: What do you do if this motorcycle wants to overtake you in a traffic jam?
cevaplar: In this lane, move carefully to the left.
In this lane, move carefully to the right.
Nothing. They are not allowed to pass the traffic jam.
sorular.dogruCevap: In this lane, move carefully to the right.

feedback.metin: Motorcyclists are allowed to overtake traffic jams. In doing so, they must comply with a number of rules of conduct, for example, that they may only pass the traffic jam between the two lanes on the left. Also, the speed difference with the traffic jam may only be up to a maximum of 10 km/h. To let the motorcyclist pass safely, you have to move to the right in this central lane.

sorular.soru: When should a vehicle that runs on hydrogen be inspected for the first time?

feedback.metin: Passenger cars that run on diesel, gas or hydrogen (possibly in combination with an electric motor) must be inspected for the first time after 3 years and annually afterwards.

sorular.soru: Which sign indicates the narrowing or end of the hard shoulder?

feedback.metin: Sign B indicates the narrowing or end of the hard shoulder. Sign A is the chevron sign. This sign is present at forks of through roads, for example where two autowegen or two motorways split. This sign does not say anything about the hard shoulder.

sorular.soru: What is the maximum length of a trailer including load?

feedback.metin: A trailer may be up to 12 metres long both without and with cargo. It does not matter whether that load is divisible or indivisible.

sorular.soru: Can you transport a child like this, with the airbag enabled?
cevaplar: Yes. However, disabling the airbag is advised.
No. Children should never be transported in the front.
No. The airbag must be disabled.
sorular.dogruCevap: No. The airbag must be disabled.

feedback.metin: You may only transport a child like this if the passenger airbag has been disabled. If this is not possible, the child may only be transported in the back of the car.

sorular.soru: What causes rutting?

feedback.metin: Track formation is damage to the road caused by heavy lorries leaving deep tracks in the asphalt. Cars, in particular, suffer a lot from rutting because they just do not fit in the tracks, which in turn adversely affects the steering behaviour of the car. In addition, rutting results in an increased risk of aquaplaning during heavy rainfall.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to enter this road?

feedback.metin: The C-5 sign indicates that entry is allowed from both sides. So you can drive here.

sorular.soru: Which supplementary plate indicates that the sign above it is valid for the next 300 metres?

feedback.metin: Supplementary plate A indicates that the sign placed above it is valid for the next 300 metres. Supplementary plate B indicates that the sign placed above it is valid in 300 metres.

sorular.soru: Should you anticipate oncoming lorries after this sign?

feedback.metin: Sign D-4 indicates an obligation to drive straight ahead. So you are not allowed to turn left or right here. The supplementary plate indicates that this obligation only applies to lorries. However, the sign does not indicate a one-way road. So you have to expect every road user from the opposite direction, including lorries.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to drive at 40 km/h after this sign?

feedback.metin: This sign indicates an recommended speed. You are not required to adhere to this, but it is sensible. These signs are there for a reason.

sorular.soru: Can you overtake this bus?

feedback.metin: This bus is stopped at the bus stop to allow passengers to board and alight. Overtaking the bus is prohibited because you are not allowed to cross a solid line. You must wait until the bus pulls away from the stop. Crossing a solid line to overtake is only allowed when a stationary vehicle has been stopped for an extended period, for example due to a breakdown.

sorular.soru: When are you allowed to use your full-beam headlights?
cevaplar: Only in built-up areas if you do not blind anyone.
Only outside built-up areas if you do not blind anyone.
Only during the night when you are not blinding anyone.
sorular.dogruCevap: Only during the night when you are not blinding anyone.

feedback.metin: Full-beam headlights may only be used during the night and only if you will not blind other road users. Also, you are not allowed to use full-beam headlights when following other vehicles.

sorular.soru: Can the cyclist at the back overtake the cyclist in the front?
cevaplar: Yes. As long as he does not cross the solid line.
Yes. And he may also cross the solid line to do so.
No. Cyclists are not allowed to overtake each other on a cycle lane.
sorular.dogruCevap: Yes. And he may also cross the solid line to do so.

feedback.metin: Cyclists may cross the solid line on the cycle lane and use it to overtake. As this is a significant lateral shift, they must give way to other traffic and therefore may not obstruct you when overtaking another cyclist. However, cyclists usually forget to look over the shoulder, so as a car driver, you must stay aware of this. Finally, you may not cross the solid line.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to use a handheld phone while driving?

feedback.metin: Holding a mobile phone while driving is prohibited as it unnecessarily endangers other road users. This applies to anything one would hold a phone for, such as changing music, checking traffic updates, adjusting navigation, making or receiving calls, and sending or receiving text messages.

sorular.soru: Do you also need to check the tyre pressure of the spare wheel?

feedback.metin: You always must make sure that the spare wheel has the correct tyre pressure. Driving with a (spare) tyre of which the tyre pressure is too low can be very dangerous.

sorular.soru: What could be the consequences of a negative drawbar load?
cevaplar: The towing vehicle will hang backwards.

feedback.metin: The drawbar load is the weight with which the trailer rests on the tow bar. In an 'ideal' vehicle, the weight of the vehicle is distributed over the four wheels. The drawbar load must not overly disturb this balance. If the drawbar load is too high, there is too much weight on the rear wheels of the vehicle. With a negative drawbar load, there is too much weight on the front wheels. If the drawbar load is negative, the trailer may swing. The maximum allowed drawbar load of the towbar can be found in the instruction manual.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to drive like this?

feedback.metin: Some cars have a removable tow bar. This tow bar must not obscure the number plate. In that case, you may only use it if you are towing a trailer or if you are using a bicycle carrier with an extra number plate. You are not allowed to drive like this.
